title: Set alias for columns in data set but in expression builder still shows the old column names when selecting the dataset
OB: When selecting a dataset in the expression builder after setting aliases for columns, the old column names are displayed instead of the aliases.
EB: When selecting a dataset in the expression builder after setting aliases for columns, the aliases should be displayed for the column names instead of the old names.
SR:
Steps to reproduce: 
 1. Create a new data source and dataset. 
 2. Set an alias for the first column in the dataset, e.g., 'column1_alias'. 
 3. Insert a data item and bind it to the dataset. 
 4. Open the expression builder and select the dataset. 
     - Observe that the old column name is displayed instead of the alias for the first column.
